name: expectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that can usually be expected: They assume that success in winter sports is expectable for their country. The expectable return for the investor is unlikely to change in the near future. Related word
expect
More examplesFewer examplesThis third stage is perhaps expectable after the previous two. Family relationships change in expectable ways over time. She should try to maximize the expectable value of her investment.The pattern of behaviour is expectable in this environment.This outcome seems quite natural and expectable.
